comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: The picture shows the all metal monoplane designed by Melvin E. Dare (1888-1929) in 1921, here fitted with 400 hp Liberty engine. Standing in front is Eddie Stinson, the test pilot of the machine. The machine was unstable in flight and eventually crashed in 1923. The design of the wing was patented by Melvin Dare.
